name: NOAA Programs for Disaster Relief Appropriations Act - Non-construction and Construction
beneficiary_types: Physically Afflicted (e.g. TB, Arthritis, Heart Disease)
Specialized group (e.g. health professionals, students, veterans)
applicant_types: Local (includes State-designated Indian Tribes, excludes institutions of higher education and hospitals
Private nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
Public nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
State (includes District of Columbia, public institutions of higher education and hospitals)

results.description: Infrastructure repairs for all  high-frequency radars  in the Mid-Atlantic region were completed. 6 of 17 radars were completely restored, with calibration on 3 completed. Equipment for repairing damaged buoys in the Northeast was ordered. One buoy was ordered, and two data streams  were moved to the backup cloud solution. authorizations.text: Disaster Relief Appropriations Act of 2013. Pub. L. 113, 2.

rules_regulations: Yes, see Federal Funding Opportunity (FFO) that will be developed and published by the Department of Commerce after the CFDA program is published.
